statements: SELECT * FROM energy_usage;
SELECT id, energy_consumed, timestamp, peak_hour FROM energy_usage;
SELECT energy_consumed, peak_hour FROM energy_usage WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE peak_hour = TRUE;
SELECT id, energy_consumed FROM energy_usage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_usage WHERE peak_hour = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_usage GROUP BY id HAVING total_energy_consumed > 500 ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_usage WHERE TIMESTAMP BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS average_energy_consumed, peak_hour FROM energy_usage WHERE peak_hour = FALSE GROUP BY peak_hour;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage
SELECT timestamp, ROUND(usage, 2) AS rounded_usage FROM energy_usage WHERE usage > 100
SELECT * FROM peak_hours WHERE peak = TRUE
SELECT * FROM energy_usage ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT HOUR(timestamp) AS hour_of_day, AVG(usage) AS average_usage FROM energy_usage GROUP BY hour_of_day
SELECT * FROM energy_usage ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT AVG(usage) FROM energy_usage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT timestamp, SUM(usage) AS total_usage FROM energy_usage GROUP BY timestamp ORDER BY total_usage DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT hour, CASE WHEN peak = TRUE THEN 'Peak Hours' ELSE 'Non-Peak Hours' END AS hour_type FROM peak_hours
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, energy_usage FROM energy_data WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM peak_hours WHERE peak_start_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT peak_start_time, peak_end_time FROM peak_hours ORDER BY peak_end_time;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_data WHERE energy_usage > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT users.name, energy_data.timestamp, energy_data.energy_usage FROM users JOIN energy_data ON users.user_id = energy_data.user_id WHERE energy_usage < 30;
SELECT peak_id, timestamp, peak_start_time, peak_end_time FROM peak_hours ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT timestamp, usage FROM energy_consumption
SELECT usage, timestamp FROM energy_consumption
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption
SELECT timestamp, usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT AVG(usage) AS average_usage FROM energy_consumption
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption
SELECT timestamp, usage FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM energy_consumption
SELECT MAX(usage) AS max_usage, MIN(usage) AS min_usage FROM energy_consumption
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT user_name FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM peak_hours ORDER BY peak_start DESC;
SELECT device_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM device_energy_usage GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_energy_consumed > 1000;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_usage GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT u.user_name, d.device_name, e.energy_consumed FROM users u INNER JOIN devices d ON u.user_id = d.device_id INNER JOIN energy_usage e ON d.device_id = e.device_id WHERE e.energy_consumed > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT device_type FROM devices;
SELECT peak_start, peak_end FROM peak_hours WHERE peak_start BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
